long_description: Ready for short journeys or the long haul, the smooth, steel-frame Raleigh Sojourn touring bike is ready to roll, thanks to the included rack, fenders and a comfortable Brooks saddle. Reynolds 631 butted steel frame offers smooth handling and strength under heavy loads; spoke holder and pump peg complement the classic touring design. Shimano drivetrain features a triple crankset and an 11-25 cassette for 27 gears to get you and your equipment up and over mountain passes and across the flatlands. Shimano Dura-Ace bar end shifters offer reliable, low-maintenance shifting of the Alivio and Sora derailleurs. Powerful Shimano mechanical disc brakes offer responsive braking, even in the worst conditions. Tough double-walled rims and puncture-resistant Vittoria Randonneur Cross tires have the durability needed to log long miles. Classic Brooks B17 aged leather saddle offers well-established comfort and performance. The Sojourn comes with a rear rack and fenders; platform pedals with toe clips accommodate many casual shoes. Specs on the Raleigh Sojourn touring bike are subject to change.
